TopicTitle: Can't click on ship I rendezvous with in orbit.

Articles.Content:
When I rendezvous with ship in orbit, the target information is not showing up on ship screen.  Orbital info shows up; but when I go to ship view, distance information box on target doesn't show up... I get withing 20 meters; and click ship and nothing I do gets it to show up.  Happens on EVA too.

 

Looked in settings; but I don't know what half of those buttons do, so I leave them alone.   Is one of the game settings need highlighted (or un-highlighted)?
Try hitting F4 to enable/disable ship labels. Does that fix it?
Didn't help...  Might be one of my mods.  Will keep looking.
